data.title: One of my favorite Asian markets!
data.text: One of my favorite Asian supermarkets in the Seattle area.  Good quality food at reasonable prices.  Great selection of sliced hot pot meats and the supermarket seems pretty clean overall.  Highly recommended!

data.title: Asian grocery - you'll find everything you need
data.text: This place is amazing, they have almost everything you need to cook/bake any asian dishes. They also have to-go food in the back area, glazed duck and sweets.A large selection of seafood fresh and frozen. Assorted fruits and service is pretty good as well.

data.title: Asian groceries/produce
data.text: Great selection of Asian groceries, produce, fresh (live) seafood specializing in Korean food items. Large selection of produce, fresh, ripe and ready. Produce is very well priced as compared to other grocery chains. Also good offering of Hispanic grocery items. Korean in house deli and take out.  Convenient location with ample parking. I really like this place.

data.title: Best Asian Grocery in South Sound
data.text:
H Mart is the best place to pick up your Asian grocery needs.  A huge Korean grocery store chain with locations everywhere - this is a pretty large branch.  It is much bigger than their Tacoma location with far more produce & meat...so much more that I travel extra to go here.

Produce is really well priced here.  Old school - most of it is not hyper cleaned and will need soaking or careful washing.

The meat/fish department is large and competitively priced.  I always come here for flank steak & oxtails...they're far cheaper here.

Many other Asian foodstuffs besides Korean (lots of ban chan!) - Japanese, Chinese, Filipino, Vietnamese, Indian...even a Latin American aisle. 

They also have a good selection of cooking supplies.

data.title: Great food items here
data.text: If you are looking for prepared food and Asian cooking items- this is your place.  I've never actually eaten here because I want to cook the foods that I buy right away! I don't speak any Asian languages, so I learned quickly that you need to know what you are looking for when you get there or at least spend time looking at labels and pictures on the items.  Great frozen foods and it's so much fun to compare like items in your kitchen!  My favorite store for specialty items.  The dishes and cooking items are fun, too!  Shop here for Christmas gifts and stocking stuffers, too.

data.title: Great place to shop!
data.text: H Mart is a great place to shop! They have an amazing selection of just about everything you can think about.  I love their selection of teas and coffee and every time I go in there, I go in for one thing and come out with way more.  H Mart is not my regular grocery store but they have a lot of the extras I really enjoy.

data.title: Very good
data.text: If you love Korean food and other asian cuisine, this is the best grocery store. I always buy kimchi and dried seaweed for my family. They have a little restaurant which has cheap and tasty food inside the store

data.title: Ughhh
data.text: Can this review help them fix bathroom? The floor was wet and smell was terrible... Not to mention their hand dryer was so dirty...

data.title: always with great deals
data.text: I purchased soy-mike bundle (16 boxed) with $4.99! they have good deals every day and have many selections

data.title: Good Korean Supermarket
data.text: H-Mart is a Korean supermarket with locations throughout the U.S. The location in Federal Way, WA is pretty good. They carry other Asian brands as well, so they cater to most Asians. I like the Korean bakery they have inside... yummy Korean pastries.. mmmmm

data.title: Big selection of Asian food
data.text: Not the cleanest grocery store I been in but it has a large selection of vegies and fish items. Caters to Korean cuisine but can find chinese and japanese cooking essentials there too.

data.title: Good Asian food shopping
data.text: If you are in Federal Way, Washington and need to go shop for Asian food, this is the store to go to. Clean and well stocked with a wide variety of food.

data.title: fresh and reasonable
data.text: wide variety of Korean/Japanese food items, fresh veges and fish.  The down side is that I have been getting bone chips in ground beef/pork lately.

data.title: If you don't need atmosphere (it's a grocery store!), the sushi rocks.  There is other great looking asian food...
data.text: If you don't need atmosphere (it's a grocery store!), the sushi rocks.  There is other great looking asian food available at the food counter, but I always go back to the sushi.  Created right there in front of you.  YUM.
